about.title: About ARWAD Trading
about.subtitle: Excellence in MRO & Supply Chain Management
about.description: ARWAD Trading is a leading regional provider of MRO solutions, spare parts, and supply chain management services. We partner with industrial and infrastructure sectors to maximize uptime, optimize operational costs, and deliver reliability when it matters most.
about.overview: With over a decade of experience in the Middle Eastern industrial sector, ARWAD Trading has established itself as a premier provider of Maintenance, Repair, and Operations (MRO) solutions. Our commitment to excellence, backed by a robust network of international suppliers and local expertise, ensures that our clients receive the highest quality components and services.
about.vision_text: To become the most trusted regional leader in supply chain management and MRO services, supporting industrial excellence across the Middle East and beyond.
about.mission_text: Delivering the right part, at the right time, with technical excellence and an unparalleled supplier network. We empower our clients to focus on their core operations while we handle the complexity of procurement and maintenance support.

industries.title: Industries We Serve
industries.subtitle: Specialized solutions across diverse sectors
industries.description: ARWAD Trading serves a wide range of industrial sectors with tailored MRO solutions and supply chain expertise.

water.title: Water & Desalination
water.description: Comprehensive support for water treatment plants, desalination facilities, and distribution networks with critical spare parts and technical expertise.
water.details: Our water and desalination division specializes in high-pressure pumps, membrane systems, chemical dosing equipment, and monitoring solutions. We understand the critical nature of water infrastructure and provide rapid response support.

power.title: Power Generation & Distribution
power.description: Reliable procurement solutions for power plants, substations, and electrical distribution systems to ensure continuous energy delivery.
power.details: We supply critical components for thermal power plants, combined cycle facilities, and electrical substations. Our expertise includes transformers, switchgear, control systems, and protection equipment with rapid emergency response capabilities.

manufacturing.title: Manufacturing
manufacturing.description: Complete MRO support for consumer goods, chemicals, and packaging industries, minimizing downtime and maximizing production efficiency.
manufacturing.details: Our manufacturing solutions cover production lines, processing equipment, and material handling systems. We provide preventive maintenance support, emergency spares, and technical consultation to keep your operations running smoothly.

petrochemical.title: Petrochemicals & Refining
petrochemical.description: Specialized solutions for refineries, chemical plants, and processing facilities with stringent safety and quality requirements.
petrochemical.details: We understand the demanding environments of petrochemical operations. Our portfolio includes high-grade materials, explosion-proof equipment, and certified components that meet international safety standards.

mining.title: Mining & Heavy Equipment
mining.description: Heavy equipment support and spare parts for mining operations, ensuring productivity in demanding environments.
mining.details: We supply wear parts, structural components, and critical systems for mining equipment including crushers, conveyers, and extraction machinery. Our inventory includes OEM and high-quality aftermarket parts.

infrastructure.title: Buildings & Infrastructure
infrastructure.description: Comprehensive solutions for commercial buildings, airports, seaports, and major infrastructure projects.
infrastructure.details: From HVAC systems to fire protection, we provide the components and technical support needed for large-scale infrastructure. Our expertise covers mechanical, electrical, and plumbing systems with 24/7 emergency support.

products.title: Our Products
products.subtitle: Comprehensive inventory of industrial components
products.description: Browse our extensive catalog of industrial components, equipment, and spare parts.
products.overview: {brand} maintains an extensive inventory of industrial components, spare parts, and equipment across all major categories. Our partnerships with leading global manufacturers ensure access to genuine OEM parts, while our aftermarket options provide cost-effective alternatives without compromising quality or reliability.

desc.ventilators: Industrial ventilation systems, air handling units, HEPA filters, ducting components, and air quality monitoring equipment.
desc.inspection: NDT equipment, ultrasonic testers, vibration analyzers, thermal imaging cameras, and calibration tools.
desc.cooling: Cooling towers, chillers, heat exchangers, thermal control systems, and temperature management solutions.
desc.desalination: RO membranes, high-pressure pumps, water quality analyzers, chemical dosing systems, and filtration units.
desc.heavy: Hydraulic cylinders, power transmission components, bearings, seals, and heavy-duty mechanical parts.
desc.measurement: Pressure transmitters, flow meters, level sensors, temperature controllers, and PLCs.
desc.factory: Motor components, electrical panels, pneumatic systems, conveyor parts, and production line equipment.
desc.spare_parts: Comprehensive inventory of OEM and aftermarket parts for pumps, valves, motors, and industrial equipment.

usp.oem_desc: Direct partnerships with manufacturers ensure authenticity and warranty coverage
usp.delivery_desc: Strategic inventory and logistics network enable fast turnaround times
usp.support_desc: Expert guidance on part selection, compatibility, and installation
